sentences.english: But he goes even further than this.
Said another way, you must base your argument on the city you studied in Assignment 2.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，你必须以作业2所研究的城市做申论基础。

sentences.english: It consists of a series of essay questions covering the scope of the course.
sentences.chinese: 有一系列涵盖课程范围的申论题。

sentences.english: He tripped up on the essay part of the exam.
sentences.chinese: 他在这次考试中，申论题部分答错了。
